column4: don't know if that is the right place to ask, but I will.... how do I get USB working in Virtual Box on Hardy?
did you install vbox from their site or the repos?
from their site
hang on and I'll give you a link to my fstab.. it has a line you need to put into yours.
love you already...:)
carefull.. I don't live in that part of town.. http://pastebin.com/f2a4c2b7a

it's the last line in fstab that you need.  :)
